## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ec0b1a38dedf4534ebb29ea3d45af93b41e050a360c99c229eaaff93be82f775)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pro-rhr-container' @ 9.0.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
